title: Play Like the Pros Mission Eligible Champions

replies.body: Why is Soraka's primary role support?, shes clearly a Marksman. {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.poster: xl D A N T E lxx

replies.body: even with the new skin coming out?

Hi everyone, we're continuing to notice issues with this mission. While for some players they may have simply played the wrong champion (due to the list being out of date, sorry about that) we are seeing cases where players have used the correct champion in the correct mode and still not complete the mission. We are investigating the issue and I'll update this post when we know more.

UPDATE: I am seeing this mission now completing for players that were previously having issues so I believe the issue was fixed earlier this evening.
Hey, the mission is still bugged for me. not the first time ive had issues with missions in the client. do i need to submit a ticket to have this issue resolved?
Does this mission work for ARAM just curious?
Any 5v5 PvP Matchmade game. So yes, ARAM counts :)
just got velkoz in aram, didn't count.
I've done a few of the other missions in ARAM so I know they're meant to work, possibly a bug with this weeks mission but not totally sure sorry.

ive done almost all of mine in aram. aram is the SHITE!
they will specify if it needs to be on a certain mode like they have with winning on "summoners rift" in certain time

Yeah it turns out the OCE champ list for the play like the pros missions was actually outdated and that's why playing Vel didn't complete the mission :P

Some of the missions are so much easier on ARAM I love it. Good for those ones you only get 2 days to do.
Riot is literally just flexing their champion diversity on us.
"flexing their champion diversity". It wants to be like DotA 2. Only 3 heroes weren't picked or banned in The International. The diversity in League is better than what it was a couple months ago

I wouldn't say "wants to be like DOTA 2" but rather they just want to have a game where you can pick any character and have the opportunity to do well. If you have a game where you can only succeed by abiding to what's the best then you've more or less failed.

no love for ammumu{{champion:32}} 
And Riven{{champion:92}}
this mission is bugged,i played fiora and it didnt count for my mission.
this dint work for me as i have played jayce and aatrox top and still the mission is not complete
There was an issue last week with the list being outdated, seems it's happened again. It should be updated soon. :(
I played Thresh and Rakan, even won on them, and still haven't completed this?
There was an issue last week with the list being outdated, seems it's happened again. It should be updated soon. :(

so i choose 2 people from here and i still didnt finish the mission 

help
There was an issue last week with the list being outdated, seems likely it's happened again. Just play whatever for now and it should be updated soon. :(
